search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Actionstep (actionstep.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Actionstep is: [https://www.actionstep.com/pricing/](https://www.actionstep.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

What Are You Looking For?

Pricing
=======

**See Available Features in your Region**
=========================================

Actionstep is designed to meet the unique needs of law firms worldwide. Select your location to view pricing and features available in your region.

Location:

LAW FIRM MANAGEMENT PLATFORM 

**Practice Management** 
------------------------

An adaptable practice management platform to manage all the business, administration and legal work at midsize law firms. Connect and organize your client, matter, document, administrative, billing, and management processes with modern law firm software and powerful automated workflows.    
  
_Priced per user plus implementation fees_ 

Key Features

*   Matter & Case Management
*   Client Intake & Form Management
*   Document Management, Assembly, & Storage
*   Client Relationship Management
*   Client Portal
*   Custom Business Reporting

*   Marketing & Business Development
*   Client Communication
*   Advanced Calendaring
*   Task and Process Management
*   Data Management
*   Workflow Automation

*   Core Accounting Tools
*   Financial Reporting
*   Microsoft Office Connection
*   Access to Powerful Integrations
*   Enterprise-Level Security
*   Access to Support Team & Resources

[Request Pricing](https://www.actionstep.com/book-a-demo/)

included

LEGAL ACCOUNTING PLATFORM 

**Legal Accounting**
--------------------

Available separately or as an addition to practice management, Actionstep’s Legal Accounting is a comprehensive accounting suite designed for midsize law firms. Manage firm profitability and ensure compliance with all accounting standards. Capabilities include general ledger, banking, accounts payable, trust accounting, revenue recognition, P&L statements, and custom financial reports.    
   
_Priced per user plus implementation fees_ 

Key fEatures

*   Multi-Currency General Ledger
*   Banking Transactions & Reconciliation
*   Profit & Loss Statements
*   Expense and Disbursement Management

*   Accounts Payable & Receivable
*   Financial Reporting
*   Cashflow Management
*   Budgeting

*   Forecasting
*   Revenue Recognition
*   Payments

[Request Pricing](https://www.actionstep.com/book-a-demo/)

Get a head start

Actionstep accelerators
-----------------------

Get a head start on Actionstep’s adaptable practice management platform with our pre-packaged workflows and configurations, designed to accelerate the value you gain from Actionstep from day one. Reach out to learn more.

[Contact Us](https://www.actionstep.com/contact/)

![Image 9](https://www.actionstep.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/11-AS-Portrait-1024x683.jpeg)

Get Started Today

**Implementation** 
-------------------

Before implementing Actionstep, you’ll be connected with one of our trusted, certified implementation partners to set up your law firm management platform successfully.

Our implementation partners all have expertise in the law firm management and legal practice management arena and undergo specialized certification processes to become consulting partners.

[Get a Quote](https://www.actionstep.com/contact/)

![Image 10](https://www.actionstep.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/WomanAtLaptop1-1024x680.jpg)

Finance options
---------------

Reduce the burden of up-front costs. Explore finance options for your implementation so you don’t have to delay using Actionstep.

Enquire for more information.

[Contact Sales](https://www.actionstep.com/contact/)

Have questions?
---------------

Get in touch.

[Contact Sales](https://www.actionstep.com/contact/)

![Image 11](https://www.actionstep.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/AdobeStock_369977292-1024x646.jpg)

How Actionstep works for your firm

**Who we help**
---------------

Take control of your firm’s success. Actionstep grows and evolves with your firm, supporting all practice areas and legal expertise.
